Subject: Hot Rod & Feline
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

"No keep it. I know you cant remember, but we had something. And I love
you. Thats something for you to remember me by. And as I said in the
note, I'll be back for you."
He started running to an exit. When he got there he transformed and flew
out, at 230mph. He passed right by Represser. He headed to the end of
the island. When he got there he hit the water, and used the high speed
of his wheels to propell him.(He can do this. He did it in TF:TM) He
headed for the CF.

::Demolition::

With the lockdown gone, Demo was about to enter the base, when he saw
Hot Rod speed out.
"What the? Vehical mode!"
He transformed to plane mode, and tracked Hot Rod.
